subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Only five players in major league history have had 1,500 hits and 250 homers, while hitting .310 or better, through their age-28 season. Miguel Cabrera is one of them.
snippet: Only five players in major league history have had 1,500 hits and 250 homers, while hitting .310 or better, through their age-28 season. Miguel Cabrera is one of them.
